means: 有公德心的，有爱国心的

sentence.Network_en: That was very public-spirited of you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你那样做真是热心公益啊！

sentence.Network_en: Thanks to a group of public-spirited citizens, the Krippendorf garden has been preserved.
sentence.Network_cn: 多亏了一些热心公益的市民，克里彭多夫花园才得以保留了下来。

sentence.Network_en: This project needs more public - spirited people.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个项目需要更多热心公益的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... public-opinion poll 民意测验 public-spirited 有公德心的 publican 收税员.
笔记-进阶班... ... eg. a spirited girl 一个勇敢的女孩 public-spirited 热心公益的, a spirited debate 热烈的辩论.
热心公益（public-spirited）的沪友们不愧是最可爱的！ 公益主要指有关社会公众的福祉和利益。
Thanks to a group of public-spirited citizens, the Krippendorf garden has been preserved.多亏了一些热心公益的市民，克里彭多夫花园才得以保留了下来。

品质道... ... 违法： offend against the law 有公德心： be public-spirited 向公众呼吁做某事： appeal to the public to do sth.

entry.tran: 热心公益的；有公益精神的
entry.def: A public-spirited person tries to help the community that they belong to.

example.ex: Thanks to a group of public-spirited citizens, the Krippendorf garden has been preserved.
example.tran: 多亏了一些热心公益的市民，克里彭多夫花园才得以保留了下来。

means.word_mean: 1. showing unselfish interest in the public welfare;
